 test12
--------
Layer             : II 
Protection        : no
Bitrate base      : 384 kbit/s
Sampling rate     : 48 kHz
Private bit       : 0
Mode              : stereo
Copyright         : no
Original          : yes
Emphasis          : none (flat)

Configuration     : 3/2.0
Extension         : yes
Bitrate extension : 384 kbit/s
Matrix procedure  : 0
Dynamic crosstalk : no
Phantom centre    : no
Prediction        : no
Multilingual      : 7 channels
Multilingual fs   : 24 kHz

Ancillary data    : none

Nr. of frames     : 20
Test signal       : left channel: female english speech;
                    right channel: male english speech;
                    center channel: female french speech;
                    surroud channels: stereo castanets signal;
Files             : test12.mpg
